headline: Change Foods raises $12M to scale animal-free cheese
summary: Precision-fermentation startup Change Foods secures funding to expand production of vegan cheese alternatives.

headline: Modern Synthesis raises $4.1M to scale microbial textile production
summary: Biomaterial startup Modern Synthesis gains investment for scaling their microbial textile alternative to leather/plastic.

headline: Solar Foods opens first commercial Solein protein factory
summary: Solar Foods commences commercial production of Solein, a protein powder made from air and electricity.

headline: Algenesis receives grant to develop algae-based polyurethane
summary: Algenesis awarded funding to advance development of sustainable polyurethane from algae biomass.

headline: Remilk partners with major food company for alt-dairy products
summary: Remilk collaborates with established food manufacturer to increase availability of precision-fermented dairy alternatives.

headline: BioMason raises funding to scale bio-based cement production
summary: BioMason secures investment for scaling up production of their biologically-created cement alternatives.

headline: The EVERY Co. launches animal-free egg whites in foodservice
summary: The EVERY Co. expands distribution of its precision-fermented egg whites to restaurants and other foodservice providers.

headline: Bolt Threads partners with luxury brand on mushroom leather apparel
summary: Bolt Threads announces collaboration with a major luxury brand to create apparel using Mylo mushroom leather.

headline: Nature's Fynd expands Fy protein availability in retail
summary: Nature's Fynd increases retail presence of products made with their unique Fy protein, grown via fermentation.

headline: Mango Materials announces new PHA production facility
summary: Mango Materials unveils plans for a new facility to increase production of their PHA biodegradable plastic alternative.
